name: Martini
build: Build in mixing glass, add ice and stir. Garnish according to your choice!

name: Whiskey Sour
build:
Dry shake egg white, add the rest of the ingredients, ice, and shake again.
Strain into a chilled coupe.

name: Manhattan
build:
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass with ice and stir.
Strain into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with brandied cherry.

name: Negroni
build:
Add all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
Garnish with an orange peel.

name: Daiquiri
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice, shake.
Strin into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with a lime twist

name: Old Fashioned
build:
Add sugar, water, and bitters, stir until sugar dissolved.
Fill mixing glass with ice, add whiskey, stir.
Strain into rocks glass over large ice cube.
Express orange twist over glass and drop in.

name: Tom Collins
build:
Add all ingredients to a collins glass, fill with ice, top with club soda and stir.
Garnish with a lemon wheel.

name: Sazerac
build:
Rinse a chilled rocks glass with absinthe and discard.
In a mixing glass, muddle sugar, water, and bitters.
Add rye, fill with ice, and stir.
Strain into rocks glass.
Express lemon peel and drop in.

name: Paloma
build:
Add tequila, lime juice, and salt to a collins glass and fill with ice. top with grapefruit soda and stir to combine.
Garnish with lime wheel

name: Margarita
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice and shake.
Strain into rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a lime wheel and (optional) salt rim.

name: Moscow Mule
build:
Fill a mule mug with ice, add vodka and lime juice.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Sidecar
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake with ice.
Strain into chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with orange twist and (optional) sugar rim.

name: Martinez
build:
Add all ingredients to mixing glass with ice and stir.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Pimm's Cup
build:
Add Pimms #1 and lemon juice to highball glass over ice, then top with ginger ale.
Stir briefly to combine.
Garnish with cucumber slice, mint sprig, skewered strawberry.

name: Pisco Sour
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker and dry shake.
Add ice and shake.
strain into Nick & Nora or rocks glass.
Garnish with 3-4 drops Angostura bitters. Swirl with a straw.

name: French 75
build:
Add gin, lemon juice, and simple syrup to shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into Champagne flute.
Top with Champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Mint Julep
build:
In julep cup or rocks glass, muddle mint leaves with simple syrup.
Add bourbon and pack tightly with crushed ice.
Stir.
Top with more ice and garnish with mint sprig.

name: Last Word
build:
Add all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into a chilled coupe glass.
Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Irish Coffee
build:
Fill a mug with hot water to heat, then discard.
Add whiskey and sugar to the glass, fill with coffee, and stir.
Top with whipped cream.

name: Corpse Reviver #2
build:
Rinse the inside of a chilled coupe with absinthe and discard.
Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake with ice.
Strain into prepared glass.

name: Mojito
build:
Lightly muddle the mint with simple syrup in a shaker.
Add rum, lime juice, and ice, shake, strain into a highball class over fresh ice.
Top with club soda.
Garnish with a mint sprig and lime wheel.

name: Gin Fizz
build:
Add gin, lemon juice, syrup, and egg white to a shaker and dry-shake.
Add ice and shake.
Strain into Collins glass and top with club soda.

name: Bloody Mary
build:
Squeeze a lemon and a lime wedge into a shaker and drop in. Add vodka, tomato juice, 2 dashes Tabasco, 2 dashes Worcestershire sauce, 1 pinch black pepper, 1 pinch paprika, 1 pinch celery salt and shake with ice.
Strain into Collins glass.
Garnish with parsley sprig, speared olives, lime wedge, celery stalk.

name: Gimlet
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker and shake with ice.
Strain into chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Americano
build:
Combine sweet vermouth and Campari in a highball glass and fill with ice.
Top with club soda and stir gently.
Garnish with an orange twist

name: Mai Tai
build:
Add all ingredients except dark rum to a shaker filled with crushed ice and shake lightly.
Pour into a double rocks glass.
Float dark rum on top.
Garnish with lime wheel and mint sprig.

name: Caipirinha
build:
Muddle cachaça, sugar, and a whole lime cut into quarters.
Top with crushed ice.

name: Espresso Martini
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with 3 coffee beans.

name: Aperol Spritz
build:
Add all ingredients to a wine glass filled with ice and stir.
Garnish with an orange slice.

name: Boulevardier
build:
Combine all ingredients in a mixing glass and stir with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large ice cube.
Garnish with an orange twist.

name: Jungle Bird
build:
Add all ingredients in a shaker filled with ice and shake.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a pineapple wedge

name: Bee's Knees
build:
Add all ingredients to a shaker filled with ice and shake.
Strain into a chilled coupe.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Dark 'n Stormy
build:
Add rum and lime juice to a Collins glass filled with ice.
Top with ginger beer.
Garnish with a lime wheel.

name: Vieux Carré
build:
Add all ingredients to a mixing glass filled with ice and stir.
Strain into a rocks glass over fresh ice.
Garnish with a cherry, lemon twist, or both.

name: Cosmopolitan
build:
Combine all ingredients into a shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a lime wedge.

name: Bramble
build:
Add all ingredients except crème de mûre to a shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into a rocks glass over crushed ice.
Float crème de mûre on top.
Garnish with a lemon half-wheel and a fresh blackberry.

name: Aviation
build:
Combine all ingredients in a shaker with ice and shake.
Strain into a chilled cocktail glass.
Garnish with a brandied cherry.

name: Mimosa
build:
Pour orange juice into a champagne flute.
Top with Champagne.

name: Champagne Cocktail
build:
Place sugar cube at the bottom of a champagne flute and douse with bitters.
Top with Champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Kir Royale
build:
Pour crème de cassis into a Champagne flute.
Top with Champagne.
Garnish with a lemon twist.

name: Rusty Nail
build:
Mix in a mixing glass with ice.
Strain into a rocks glass over a large cube.
